com.playernguyen.optecoprime.events

Class OptEcoBalanceChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • com.playernguyen.optecoprime.events.OptEcoEventAbstract
        • com.playernguyen.optecoprime.events.OptEcoBalanceChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Cancellable

    public class OptEcoBalanceChangeEvent
extends OptEcoEventAbstract
    An event that triggers when player balance is increased or decreased. Cannot set unchange balance (recent and current balance are equivalent)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.bukkit.event.Event

        org.bukkit.event.Event.Result

      The default constructor is defined for cleaner code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrentBalance()
      A current balance, after changing balance.
      OptEcoPlayer getPlayer()
      A player who has changed.
      double getRecentBalance()
      A recent balance, before change balance.
      boolean isDecrease()
      Check if after change the status is increased by compare recent balance is higher than current balance.
      boolean isIncrease()
      Check if after change the status is increased by compare recent balance is lower than current balance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptEcoBalanceChangeEvent

        public OptEcoBalanceChangeEvent(OptEcoPrime plugin,
                                OptEcoPlayer player,
                                double recentBalance,
                                double currentBalance)
        The default constructor is defined for cleaner code. This constructor assumes the event is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        plugin - an OptEcoPrime plugin
        player - a new player, after modified
        recentBalance - old player balance before change
        currentBalance - new player balance afterwards.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public OptEcoPlayer getPlayer()
        A player who has changed.
        Returns:
        a player who change their balance

      • getRecentBalance

        public double getRecentBalance()
        A recent balance, before change balance.
        Returns:
        a recent balance

      • getCurrentBalance

        public double getCurrentBalance()
        A current balance, after changing balance.
        Returns:
        a current balance that player is having.

      • isIncrease

        public boolean isIncrease()
        Check if after change the status is increased by compare recent balance is lower than current balance.
        Returns:
        true if is increase, false otherwise.

      • isDecrease

        public boolean isDecrease()
        Check if after change the status is increased by compare recent balance is higher than current balance. Invertion of isIncrease()
        Returns:
        true if is decrease, false otherwise.
